items.title: All Terrain
items.description: All-terrain tires offer drivers traction on- and off-road, and are typically used by light truck and SUV drivers who want a tire that's able to climb rocks and perform on the highway.

items.title: Mud Terrain
items.description: Mud Terrain tires offer drivers traction on off-road terrains such as mud, dirt, sand, gravel, and rock, and are commonly used on CUVs, SUVs, light trucks, and jeeps.

items.title: All Season
items.description: Most common: Good handle on dry, wet or snow

items.title: Highway
items.description: Highway terrain tires are commonly used on light trucks and SUVs that typically haul materials or need to conquer highways and some off-road terrains.

items.title: Winter
items.description: For snow, ice, and freezing temperatures

Most popular among drivers in PA

content.body:
### Shop 305/55R20 Tire Size
The 305/55R20  tire size is a light truck tire that’s a common fit on the RAM 2500 and 3500 .If you’ve got a  truck that’s rolling on 305/55R20 tires, chances are you’re looking for an all-terrain or mud terrain tire so that you can take your truck off-road as needed.

If you’re looking for a set of 305/55R20 all-terrain tires, then take a look at the [Falken Wildpeak A/T3W](https://simpletire.com/brands/falken-tires/wildpeak-a-t3w), Yokohama Geolandar AT G015, and Nexen Roadian AT Pro RA8 as each tire is engineered to perform on- and off-road.

Maybe you spend a lot of time off-road, so you need a set of 305/55R20 tires that’s a bit more aggressive than all-terrain tires. If that’s the case, check out the Nitto Trail Grappler M/T, General Grabber X3, and [Kumho Road Venture MT71](https://simpletire.com/brands/kumho-tires/road-venture-mt71) as each tires features an aggressive tread pattern and reinforced construction for use in mud, dirt, and other off-road terrains.

Whether you need a set of all-terrain, mud terrain, or another type of tire for your RAM 2500 or 3500, SimpleTire has a set of 305/55R20 tires that meets your needs at a great price!

info.title: Did you know?
info.body: A reliable brand is the #1 ask for most drivers. Here you can shop all the most popular brands and discover new ones – all tested, ranked and rated by our customers.
